MACRO-VERIFIED 38G PROTEIN

WHITE PROTEIN PIZZA
(MACRO-VERIFIED)

Protein

38G

Calories

400

Prep Time

15M

Bake Time

18M

Yield

2

Creamy white sauce protein pizza. 38g protein with garlic and ricotta. All nutrition data is verified using USDA FoodData Central for accuracy.

JUMP TO RECIPE

INGREDIENTS

  • protein pizza crust 1g
  • ricotta cheese 60g
  • shredded mozzarella 100g
  • parmesan, grated 30g
  • cloves garlic, minced 3g
  • 15ml olive oil 0g
  • Fresh basil 0g

NUTRITION PER PIZZA

38g

Protein

400

Calories

30g

Carbs

18g

Fat

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Par-bake protein crust for 8 minutes.

2

Mix olive oil with minced garlic, brush over crust.

3

Dollop ricotta, add mozzarella and parmesan.

4

Bake at 425°F for 10 minutes.

5

Top with fresh basil.
